articles.title: John Akomfrah to represent Britain at Venice Biennale - The Guardian
articles.description: The artist known for exploring racial injustice, migration and climate crisis in his films and multiscreen installations will fill the British pavilion next year
articles.content:
The artist and film-maker John Akomfrah will represent the UK at the Venice Biennale in 2024, the British Council has announced.
Akomfrah, who was honoured with a knighthood in the 2023 honours list… [+3542 chars]
